name: Sandwich Stacker (Lightning_A)
description:
My highscore is 1736, let me know yours :)

How to Play:

The goal of the game is to get the highest score. Increase your score by delivering the requested sandwiches to the food delivery people. The game ends when you run out of lives, you lose a life every time you don't deliver the sides and the sandwich in time. 

Look at a food delivery person to see their requested order. A typical order will look something like this:

  • Sandwich
    • Bread
    • Bacon
    • Lettuce
    • Tomato
    • Bread
  • Side
    • French Fries
    • Cookies

The order of the ingredients matters. Sides should be stacked too (like a french-fry cookie sandwich). Delivering either a side or a sandwich will reset the delivery person's 60 second timer.

Controls:
  • Left click to pick up sandwich pieces and stack them together
  • Press E to toss the currently held sandwich
  • Right click to drop the held sandwich
  • Shift to sprint
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to look around
  • Esc to hide/unhide mouse cursor (doesn't work for web because I forgot that web browsers use this to unhide the cursor)

Download the Windows build for the best experience (the mouse sensitivity is lower (I didn't have a lot of time to test the web build haha), and performance is better, especially in fullscreen).

Known issues:
  • Mouse sensitivity is too high on WebGL builds for some reason
  • Selected ingredient highlight doesn't work consistently (it did in the editor)
